pages.text: These AI swords are like the other Minecraft swords.

pages.title: AI swords are like Minecraft swords, inspired by a drawing of mine. The drawing is basically an RimWorld-style base but with aspects of the my Lego characters, with the rooms being the bedroom: the bedroom for Alice, Alan, Innovator, Nicolas and other characters. The kitchen: having an pretty table, some soups being cooked, and the black and white checkerboard pattern as the floor. And the inventions room: which is being made an Alan AI Sword in the table.
